entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
